name: dnd-5e-api
description: This application helps display and organize spells for Dungeons and Dragons 5e. It includes an API to query spells as well as a frontend that has a number of features. This project serves as a place to practice full stack development while also giving friends a way to organize spells in 5e. The server and client are both progressing and I am adding features as I can. The goal is to create a tool that makes it easier to organize resources for players and game masters.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
